website_summaries.verdict: An affordable router that is set up for easy optimization and WiFi sharing.
pros: Comes with fast gigabit Ethernet ports
Instantly optimize your network with the TURBO Technology button
Touchlink lets friends easily access WiFi
Manage the network from anywhere with an included smart app
cons: Some reports that this option easily drops connections

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: really good router, low price, really recommend. it's an upgraded spec but reduced price from my previously owned router, it's an AC1900. the default setup address is 192.168.10.1. and the interface is simple and clear. light can be turned off so it doesn't bother at night. the 5g coverage is good and stable, guess the 4 long antennas work really well. the most beneficial from this router is the bandwidth control. I had 10 devices streaming and gaming during evening hour, and it was really a pain, not even mentioning playing a game with lags. the bandwidth function controls download and upload speed for every device, but I found out the max speed limit is 12694kbs.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Good router for price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good replacement. If I had not set up a couple of other routers in the past, I would have been pretty much lost on this one. The instructions did not match the unit. The IP address furnished in instructions did not work. Had very hard time getting on Wavelink site. The wireless page on website did not match instructions. But, in long run, I got it going and passwords set up. Working ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: wchap

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I have two of them working in different environments. Both setups went quickly and without issue. I like the touch button that lets you share WiFi temporarily without having to reveal any keys to others. One feature I would like, but the AC1200 does not have, is the ability to assign a specific DHCP IP address to a specific device MAC. This is useful, for example, for backing up Android phones with ssh. My older Linksys DR-615 router has this feature. If you don't need that feature this product is perfect. Very powerful and fast.
customer_reviews.author: zman58

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up with included instructions!
customer_reviews.text: As many have pointed out, it's as if the instructions seem to be for something other router The 192.168.0.10 default IP doesn't work nor does the wifi.wavlink.com address. They want you to download the mywavelinkapp (which is not in the Google Store); my android phone says "This type of file can harm your device." NOT DOWNLOADING THAT!!! I am going to go with a wifi router with a more trusted name than WavLink. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Green

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest to hookup and get started. You have to go online to add a password, but again that was also easy. So far everything is working great!!
customer_reviews.author: S Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Nice directional router at good price.
customer_reviews.text: Having a big two level house is typically an issue for good WiFi. This directional unit was my fairly inexpensive solution. You can position the antennas to improve the signal to needed areas. I found the included printed instructions very simple to follow and had it up and running in just a few minutes. I really like the guest feature where you can just tap it to get a connection rather than having to repeatedly tell people at a party what the wifi password is. Definitely a good value that gives me wifi everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kirbinster (Howard)

customer_reviews.title: Worst router I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: At first it was perfect and we had no issues. Gave it a 5 star rating. A few months before we had it year, it is paper weight. It seems to only work when it wants to. Sometimes restarting it works but not long. At first we thought it was our internet. But the devices wired to it work just fine while the streaming tv keeps getting disconnected eight feet away. We have used more devices on it just fine... now it can't seem to handle any. I will never buy another wavlink and hope to save you the trouble too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not alot of features but works fine
customer_reviews.text: The router has very good wifi coverage but does not have alot of features. For example there is no remote management and it doesn't seem to do WAP mode if hooking into a second router. The setup app is crap so just use a browser. However I was unable to login via a laptop as it kept telling me bad password for the admin account. I used my Android phone and a browser and got right in so I just configure d it that way. For a no frills router it's worth $39 and I'll be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFTW

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps Too Simplistic & Fiddly
customer_reviews.text: This router probably very closely fits the description offered in the marketing information. However, network and security settings are too simplified for proper setup (at least per my requirements) via PC. There is no user ID, and password does not support special characters. Router kept forgetting region setting. Also, mobile phone App (Android via Moto) does not properly configure router ... it showed connection to router, but could not reach menu. So, it depends on what you expect and/or need.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router with high expectations, but I have not been super pleased. The settings to turn the network office Pacific time only work on the 2G network. The 2G network also drops periodically in doesn't work for many of our settings to turn the network office Pacific time only work on the 2G network. The 2G network also drops periodically in doesn't work for many of our devices. 5G seems to work fine, but it doesn't turn off when scheduled. There's a reason this router is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Update: 6/2/20 still going strong First I didn't install the app I didn't like the things it asked permission to have access to. But they have the ability to just connect to the wifi and enter a link with provided pass and you have router options. This paired great with my cat 8 ethernet cable. Now my spectrum is actually faster than what I pay for. I hope it holds up the price is great and it looks like a spaceship ha. Much better speeds than the tplink it replaced. That thing limited speeds and died in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong signal & extremely easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This product completely exceeded my expectations! It has three types of out put for 2.4 GHZ and 5 GHZ, and touch, which can be set up in your browser easily, with one password. I had to return a TP link router earlier, due to it would not connect to my PC's or its own extenders, I did not know what I was doing wrong, but the set up was complex. For people who do not want to go thru list of dozen instructions, this is it, and I highly recommend it, for the short time I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: MANDAYAM A SRINIVASAN

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use, get one for your self 😉
customer_reviews.text: Okay I'll just say it out; this is the first router I have bought on Amazon that actually works as should.!!! It is so easy to setup and best of all, you can limit bandwidth to every device easily and I mean EASY!!! I do recommend that you get your own and try it, really, it will surprise you too. It gave me control, RANGE and good throughput. Like a said, try one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deon P.

customer_reviews.title: the web page for settings for this router
customer_reviews.text: router operates very good..after install and you want to get back to your settings for the router is like this.... control panel, devices, right click on smart router and at the top of the box is the web page.click on that and it takes back to your router sign in and then settings... hope that helps...Ive seen in some blogs people were having problems getting back to the web page... otherwise very happy with product...
customer_reviews.author: iowa bird

customer_reviews.title: "STAY AWAY"
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work,was not easy to install. If you don't wanna spend wasted time or money stay clear from this. It's not worth the aggravation that comes with it. 🤬🤮🤢😱
customer_reviews.author: DogMan🐕

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought a router at Walmart for $50 that did not work. When I bought this router, there was a huge difference in the speed. My boyfriend is able to play his online games without lag and my computer loads way faster. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great price point, nice router!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router two weeks ago to replace my range extender. My house is wired for ethernet but Wi-Fi doesn't seem to go through the walls. I'm running 2 4k roku's with DirecTV-now, two desktop computers, two laptops, two cell phones and it seems to do the trick! 2.4ghz 5G and the guest Network we're all very easy to set up. It goes through the walls pretty well, better than the range extender. For the price point, I am happy with my purchase thank you. I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great router highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easiest router I have ever set up. I didn't have to download any apps or install any software. I just followed the simple directions and I was ready to go in literally less than a minute. Also this router has fast speed and looks cool. My only complaint is that the power cord is a bit too short.
customer_reviews.author: JackTheCat

customer_reviews.title: It lets you control download and upload speeds for any device connected
customer_reviews.text: I got this router because my PS4 Pro was randomly disconnecting from my old one. It worked. My PS4 Pro stays connected at all times now. And being a smart router, you can control the download and upload speeds of devices connected to it. Very useful if you have slow internet speeds. I was able to find out what was hogging bandwidth multiple times since getting mine
customer_reviews.author: Jarrhead

customer_reviews.title: Connection Established
customer_reviews.text: Product installed nicely. Took a bit to get it where I wanted it as far as the settings. Since my initial setup it has been doing a great job connection wise. Only had to reboot once since I purchased and installed, turned out to be the complex that had the issue not the wifi router, so I guess you can say...so far so good. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid router for the money...improved my speed by 30 to 40 mbps
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, improved my speed by approx 40 mbps througout most of my 3 story home...easy to setup and has a 1000mbps LAN output that my son uses for his gaming pc..Pings at 2 to 3 m/s...pretty decent router for the money...I have fiber optic internet, that used a decent at best router...this improved my signal so Ill give the 5 stars...will eventually upgrade to the 400 dollar router i wanted, but couldnt convince the wife to let me get 😂
customer_reviews.author: BadHip

customer_reviews.title: Setup Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Setup instructions say to connect your phone to wavlink-wifi, but that is not an option on available wifi networks. I see wavlink-d80e, wavlink-ac-d80e, and wavlink-d80e-touch. I have tried all 3. None of them work. The app just hangs on the connect to wifi screen.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Great dual band router for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Have several devices (cameras, smartplugs, and at least three to five cell phones and tablets) connected at any given time. Have not seen any drop in signal or connectivity yet. Also, some of the devices are outdoors and about 20-30 feet away from the router (router is high up inside the house) - still constant signal.
customer_reviews.author: ddommo

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: Not bad a little confusing to setup some devices looses connection through out the week never happened with old router but this one gives the speeds it says
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup wasn't easy. I received an alert that that file could be harmful if I downloaded it and that my passwords to accounts on my phone could be accessed. Well, the day after dealing with this China made product I received passcodes to my phone to access my bank account. Returning to sender asap
customer_reviews.author: Sylvina

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a WiFi extender as our ISP router does not push enough to get through the walls to the office. Installation went very easy and was able to configure it without a hitch. Seems to be doing its job and would recommend this without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Leo and Maria

customer_reviews.title: Signa often drops for no reason then resumes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to upgrade router from older model had good reviews but have had no luck with it as far as being stable signal frequently drops and resumes but annoying at times reason I upgraded was to have consistency did not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo P.

customer_reviews.title: Your carrier won't support it
customer_reviews.text: Is NOT supported by Comcast. And I have had trou let returning it due to being in quarantine. (Not the product's fault but a bummer nonetheless)
customer_reviews.author: Groovylocks

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 8 months, won't power up.
customer_reviews.text: Also can't seem to find a review of the security on this thing. Press-to-connect is convenient, but I'm not sure how secure this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast speed! Don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Great price($50) and fast speeds! Easy setup. Took my spectrum internet with an old router from ~15Mbps to over ~120Mbps just by swapping in the new router. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Castonia

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - this router phones home to China
customer_reviews.text: I've had this router for quite a while, but I've now discovered it contacts servers in China HUNDREDS of times per day. See attached screenshot from my pihole DNS server. If you don't want the Chinese government spying on you, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A

customer_reviews.title: Fast but lacks even the most popular features
customer_reviews.text: The router is fast but it lacks most of the popular features and is extremely unreliable. Frequent reboots are the norm. Too bad I waited to return it so now I get to keep this paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: TechieCharlesCT

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with this Router
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these routers form different vendors about three months ago and have since the first day being deeply disappointed by the product. The router yields a very weak signal that is hard to use even in the next room. The connection drops constantly. I find myself switching the WiFi on and off just to be able to stream a short video. even my 3 year old router had a better connection. I usually do not write reviews but I hope this review will help others make a more informed decision.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great router and cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and for the money the signal is amazing. can stream 2 tv's and a ps4 and a pc playing games with no worries at all, all with 4 phones hooked to it. You can't go wrong with this router. it is a litle large, about the size of a small dinner plate but still very worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This was a great router, until it wasn't. I bought this from the warehouse refurbished. I have bought a lot of products from Amazon refurbished never had a problem, but this time I got burned. It lasted 49 days and was a excellent router, put out a very good signal..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stable performance!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best router you are gonna find for the money. I am happy, it is faster and more stable than the last router I had that cost over three times as much. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Walker3000

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow what else can I say my speed was nowhere near what I was paying for hooked up this router and I am getting all the speed I'm paying for and the signal is very strong everywhere in my house
customer_reviews.author: jeff blosser

customer_reviews.title: GreT little WiFi router
customer_reviews.text: Password change was a little troublesome but it was worth it. I have a good signal everywhere in my 3000 sq foot house. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BrianR

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: the WAVLINK AC1200,1200 Mbps Smart WiFi Router is so fast and easy to setup. this is the best WiFi Router i have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable fast
customer_reviews.text: My old WiFi router(BELKIN) would only allow 50mbps and at night would go down to 10mbps, and this WiFi router is insanely fast! 105mbps all the time with multiple devices and now I dont lag playing online multiplayer games
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great router, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a low price, easy setup and many functionalities. WiFi range is not great though, if you go far enough you lose coverage. The WiFi connection is not dropped even for the 5G connection which is awesome. All in all I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noam Bartov

customer_reviews.title: Started failing after a month
customer_reviews.text: After the first month of use, this router started dropping connections (to all devices) and needed to be rebooted every night. I was about to RMA it as a faulty unit, but of course the RMA window ended a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: M. Creech

customer_reviews.title: It's great. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: The signal is amazing, I was skeptical because it was so cheap, I just needed a router to replace an apple one. Just needed one to hardline my Xbox one, but the wifi signal ended up being better than a $300 apple router. More than happy with this and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zivile

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This little baby works great. I like that it has three output lines in the back for when I want to use a hardline instead of wifi. I use the wifi for my phone and laptop and the hardline for my gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Kunkle-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: working stable
customer_reviews.text: Need a wifi router due to moving. This is good coverage for my apartment. It fits with Spectrum. Working very well since I set it. You also could hang it on the wall but need extra things for fixing. So far it works well without any restart or reset.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Ok router, hell to set up
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent router considering the price. The range is pretty short - maybe 3 small rooms diameter max. The hardest part was setting it up. The 'app' was pretty much useless for setup - had to use the website (used on phone b/c cellular) to connect it and set up the name/password for the wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Maylon

customer_reviews.title: Fast and economical
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because there was so much interference in my building, that my old wifi burned out. Seems to be working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10min to setup, but it works like a charm. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fabs

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The touch feature is a nice addition to what I previously had.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Scandinavia

customer_reviews.title: easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: easy to set-up, easy to use. works well and as described
customer_reviews.author: M. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We were told we needed updated equipment, so I looked for the best value I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci B.

customer_reviews.title: Great part
customer_reviews.text: Works great we have a lot of different devices every thing run well it was way easy to set up still playing with and figuring it out all the options. The only thing that I was out happy about was you cant mount it on a wall
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Returned it - Couldn't get to the website to establish our secure connection
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a smartphone to use the app to set up, so tried the alternative of going to the website to set it up. Website not available. Tried several times. Returned the item. The hardware worked fine, as far as I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is crap!
customer_reviews.text: See no difference in features from the 5 year old Netgear wireless router provided by my cable company. See no extension of range. App and tech support are awful! The app developers must have been cut rate losers! Positive? Blue lights match all my other blue lights. Real piece of Chinese crap.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Losee

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Signal is weak been having it for a couple of weeks now and not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart router.
customer_reviews.text: Not a "smart" router. Barely any configuration options. I wouldn't recommend this router and would recommend a name brand one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K.

customer_reviews.title: WiFi router
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. To bad the mobile app is not available in my region.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Reid

customer_reviews.title: No support for model. Rebooting regularly
customer_reviews.text: No support documentation available. Have to reboot regularly to keep average use with 2-3 streaming devices at a consistent quality.
customer_reviews.author: angela morales

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great! Now good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router for the smart features and great signal strength. Smart features have been discontinued, we can no longer use the smart app. Router is still great for normal users. Advanced users will have to look for something else, very limited settings.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Romere

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a week!
customer_reviews.text: It was worth a shot to buy this for $30.00 on a lightning deal and it worked fine for a week, but today the 5GHz wireless went out. After many reboots and even a factory reset, the 5GHz wireless didn't recover. I'm twice shy now to go with a replacement and returning this altogether.
customer_reviews.author: J. Skokan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: very happy I get over 200 MB more than twice as fast as my old router that died
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good access point
customer_reviews.text: This WiFi access point was really bad, I couldn’t even return it in time. The WiFi connects but the data is so slow even when I am sitting right next to the access point. I have Verizon Fios 1Gig network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good deal
customer_reviews.text: I dont think there is a singular complaint i could make about this router. I am not utilizing it yet, but having two seperate wifi connections is kind of awesome. Then on top that, having the guest wifi for my in laws show up, thats going to be handy. It will allow me to get them connected and not have to give up my password. You also cant really beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Dude, trust me
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy set up, lightning fast. I mean lightning. Trust me on these points Con: not compatible with old old devices, like your ancient laptop from 1804 (2007). But, few routers are at this point
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: The speed and coverage are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this router for three years now and not once has my signal dropped out of nowhere. The speeds are pretty awesome too (about 85-100mbps with an old Arris modem), but if you need higher speeds you'll need a faster modem.
customer_reviews.author: pee pee poo poo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 5 months and so far so good. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat_Favela

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far with my cable modem. Will update if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ryder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We kept having issues with resetting our wifi and streaming with our linksys (after many years). This was easy to install and we have had no issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Cortez

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back!
customer_reviews.text: A cute-looking black spaceship thing with blue lights, but weak and nearly useless as a router.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good router
customer_reviews.text: I use this router for my firestick and 4k video and security cameras.more speed and extended range is what I got.good product.
customer_reviews.author: johnnathon clark

customer_reviews.title: Highly req!
customer_reviews.text: Great price took only 15min to hook up and very easy
customer_reviews.author: jtrain369

customer_reviews.title: Good product for less than 100$
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I was looking for a basic router 5GHz as the 2.4GHz is crowded where I am and for the price I paid, less than 100$ it's perfect. I would appreciate possibility of a custom password for guests instead of opened and need of approval in the admin interface.
customer_reviews.author: Pitch

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: No technical support and cannot label network or hook into wifi network. Tried to find technical support and wound up passing the return date. Could not find tech support. Even Geek Squad could not help.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Cook

customer_reviews.title: great router for price
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace router that I had for the last 7 years this was great upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price and solid product. I replaced a hard wire GB router and wireless access point that failed often with this. Great coverage awesome speed. Easy setup. IMHO one of the best deals out there. So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The touch feature is perfect for when guests are over, no worries about needing to give out the password over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rounter is all I can say!
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent rounter, it does increased my WiFi speed and easy to set up. The WiFi signal I have right now is better than ever. Great product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and nice WiFi connections. The only down side is finding the web link in order to see who’s on your WiFi connections. After getting the link your able to re name all of the connections.
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: All my devices have perfect connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all my devices have a perfect connectivity to the wiffi all the time and in evey part of my home and it was very easy to configurate
customer_reviews.author: DEYKA CUMMINGS

customer_reviews.title: Decent entry level gaming router
customer_reviews.text: Relatively fast. Hard to screw up the settings. Could use more options but it's overall an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a TP-Link router and was very happy with the performance of this smart router. Easy set up of dual band network. The touch broadcasting is a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tfurlin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought for online gaming and streaming. Much better than the basic router that came with my modem from Optimum. Can't beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what its supposed be
customer_reviews.text: Was not or its not as strong wi-fi as they say it is. It comes and goes. very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Keith

customer_reviews.title: A little challenging to setup, but good product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get a hold of someone for tech support for setup, but eventually I figured it out after a little more googling and talking to my internet provider.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Too Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: Security features is iffy on this thing. No options to select security settings. At first setup, my wifi connection remained open. Had to reset and reboot a few times for encryption to enable by itself somehow.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aboubakari

customer_reviews.title: great router
customer_reviews.text: I used to use another router, and I was not satisfied with the speed, now everything is fine, outwardly even very beautiful and clear, I set up everything pretty quickly, thanks a lot to the seller
customer_reviews.author: DMITRIY BABENKO

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Speeds
customer_reviews.text: Product was complicated to setup took a long time, and WiFi speeds are so horrible and are as low as possible. And lower than my home internet.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Hardison

customer_reviews.title: WAWLINK AC 1200
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived sooner than expected. Everything as it should be. Cheaper than others better known, but in the same range of quality
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rodriguez-Yturbe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s great as a product!! The only issue is time setting. It only identifies some countries.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Rico

customer_reviews.title: service
customer_reviews.text: it didn’t work for my ring equipment doorbell chime or ring floodlight

customer_reviews.author: Csws

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work mbps was slower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this router because all the good reviews. Currently have a Linksys Cisco router 1000 was getting around 50-70 mbps. Received the wavlink router followed the instructions setup was very straight forward. User friendly interface, instantly connected to internet. Tried streaming sluggish lagging. Did a speed test 10mbps over and over again. Thought maybe I connected wrong? Checked all the cables, resected my modem and the router, another speed test 10mbps. Wow really? I have spectrum internet so I thought maybe the network was down. I hook up my old router do a speed test 68mbps. So I think now ok let me hook up the new router. Speed test 10mbps WOW! Ridiculous I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace our internet providers router. I have to say I’m very impressed, my bedroom TV used to get kicked off the WIFI with our old one and with this one I have been able to watch TV with no issues. Another plus, the parental control is AWESOME! With my netgear through our provider they advised we could use the app for parental controls and that was a LIE, with this router you put in the site on your search bar on your phone and POOF, better than an app. I also like that I can kick people off my WIFI (my kids lol) so it’s definitely brought more motivation to my kids😂
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this router . Currently renovating a property and have security cameras up all over the outside of the home , my old router couldn’t reach the cameras over the garage bc the router was on the opposite side of the house. The WAVLINK gives these cameras full bars !
customer_reviews.author: Kait

product_meta.title: 1200Mbps Smart WiFi Router, WAVLINK AC1200 Dual-Band Gigabit Ethernet Router WiFi Wireless 5Ghz + 2.4Ghz Gaming WiFi Router High Speed Wireless WiFi Box with Long Range for Gaming Xbox Playstation PC
feature_bullets: ✅Patent Touchlink Technology - Touchlink technology makes the most delightful thing ever when you have a party or invite friends over, touch and connect, your friends and guests can get Wi-Fi access by themselves without needs of telling them the Wi-Fi passwords again and again

✅Gigabit Ports for More Needs - Gigabit Ethernet ports operates 10X faster than the standard, which helps your wired devices achieve peak performance. The USB port helps you share content from your connected USB storage devices

✅Unlimited Streaming for All Your Devices - With combined speeds of 867Mbps on the 5GHz band and 300Mbps on the 2.4GHz band up to 1200Mbps. Plus, by automatically assigning devices to the best available channel, the wifi router can connect more devices at the same time, the combined speeds is fast enough to transfer your large digital files and stream high definition video. Now, you can stream in 4K and game online without interruption on your Xbox, PlayStation, PC or Mac

✅Superior Wi-Fi for Superior Range - Four external antennas help the wifi router create a h2, far-reaching network for your home. It avoids interference to deliver the fastest wireless speeds, improved coverage and reliable connections. Get internet everywhere, Eliminate WiFi dead zones, let you enjoy smooth internet while working from home / working online / telecommuting

✅Beamforming for More Reliable Connections - Beamforming technology detect the location of your devices and concentrate wireless signal strength toward them. This makes all of your connections more efficient and stable; TURBO Technology design for your better Wi-Fi experience, just push TURBO button, your network will be optimized. You can do multiplayer gaming, HD streaming, file transfers, video chat, email, and web surfing all at the same time
